text: Each part of the District of Columbia Municipal Regulations, each permanent supplement of the District of Columbia Municipal Regulations, and the District of Columbia Register shall contain a certificate by the Administrator stating that such part contains all documents required to be published pursuant to this subchapter as of the date of such certificate.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 1-1540.

1973 Ed., § 1-1539.1.

Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 19-168 deleted "the District of Columbia Statutes-at-Large," following "Each part of".

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-153, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-505.

For history of Law 19-168, see notes under § 2-218.76.

DC CODE § 2-560

Current through December 11, 2012
